translations.pathInput: Enter the PATH where the songs should be installed
translations.badPath: The PATH wasn't found or the program doesn't have sufficient permission, please try again
translations.enterSong: Enter a songs name to search
translations.whichSong: Choose a song (enter 0 to search again)
translations.badInt: The given value isn't an integer, please try again
translations.outOfRange: The given value is out of range, please try again
translations.whichSongDefault: Enter STOP to finish song selection, to choose a song enter their corresponding number,
translations.noSongsFound: No songs for the given query were found, please try again

translations.pathInput: Unesi PATH gdje pjesme ce biti instalirane
translations.badPath: PATH ne postoji ili program nema potrebno dopustenje za taj PATH, probaj ponovo
translations.whichSong: Izaberi pjesmu (upisi 0 za ponovno trazenje pjesmi)
translations.badInt: Dati unos nije broj, pokusaj ponovo
translations.outOfRange: Dati unos je van ranga, pokusaj ponovo
translations.whichSongDefault: Upisi STOP za prestanak, za odabir pjesma njihov redni broj
translations.noSongsFound: Nema pjesmi za dati unos, probaj ponovo
